summary: adds helmet made of skeever hide
descriptionHtml:
You don't need to remind me this mod looks dumb, I'm aware of it.

This silly mod  was made by silly me to carry out a silly request from silly user.

Only Helmet is included, with Daedric heavy, Dragonscale light and cloth version.

Craftable and temperable with smithing perks suit to thier material (Cloth version doesn't require any perk)

Do anything you want with this stuff if you have, you even don't need to disturb me to inform that you are going to make another silly thing with this. 

have fun 

Ah yes I almost forgot to tell the helmet is compatible with creature type skeever's texture.
author: goldiocks
